title: Shedding: A Nagalian Love Story
description: Dianna Montague finds herself in a deep, sinking battle with depression due to her lack of knowledge and lack of self-acceptance of her identity. Born and raised by a half Nagalian mother, Dianna only knows one way to be herself, and that is to hate who she is...until she meets Drax Ashton, an accomplished, affluent, and powerful heir to Nagalian aristocracy. He shows her an entirely new world of a thriving underground subculture that takes Dianna out of her comfort zone and forces her to face and overcome her personal struggles as Drax fights to save her from herself, all while they both spiral into a crazy, toxic love affair with each other. Dianna must face some hard truths and learn some hard lessons as she sheds her skin to become a better version of herself...
author: C.C.  Miller
